title: Blood Brothers: Escape to Creeporia
description: Two of the world’s top assassins—fraternal twins separated from birth, but inevitably drawn to the same kind of women—find themselves married to a pair of sorceresses. When their firm schedules the hit men for cancellation, their one escape is through the women they love into a realm of magic, dragons, and warlocks, which will require both their skills to survive.
author: Dean C. Moore
